title: June Jobs Report Surpasses Expectations
itunes:title: June Jobs Report Surpasses Expectations
description:
Former U.S. Deputy Secretary of Labor Chris Lu breaks down the June jobs report. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Zeke Faux talks about his story “Pats Fan Stole Giants’ Super Bowl Rings But Fumbled Bigger Score.” We get Businessweek Economics with Bloomberg Economics Senior U.S. Economist Yelena Shulyatyeva. Shima Hamidi, Bloomberg Professor of American Health in the Department of Environmental Health and Engineering at Johns Hopkins University, discusses the impact of COVID-19 on U.S. cities. And we Drive to the Close with Alan Zafran, Founding Partner and Co-CEO at IEQ Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
